## Character Profiles

### Luna - The Cheerleader / Pop Princess
**Personality**: Energetic cheerleader who sees potential in everyone
**Writing Style**: Enthusiastic, encouraging, uses lots of exclamation marks, bubbly and positive
**Tone**: Peppy, encouraging, full of sparkle
**Catchphrases**: 
- "Yes! That's it, superstar!"
- "Shine brighter, don't be shy!"
- "One more time ‚Äî with extra sparkle."
- "You're absolutely crushing it!"
- "Let's make this dance floor sparkle!"

### Marcus - The Smooth Operator / R&B Cool
**Personality**: Cool and collected mentor who emphasizes flow and groove
**Writing Style**: Smooth, flowing, confident, uses longer sentences, chill and relaxed
**Tone**: Laid-back, confident, smooth-talker
**Catchphrases**:
- "Relax. The beat's already in you."
- "Don't force it ‚Äî let it flow."
- "Smooth, clean, unstoppable."
- "Feel the rhythm, let it guide you."
- "You've got the groove, now own it."

### Alex - The Cocky Showman
**Personality**: Confident showman who pushes dancers to their limits
**Writing Style**: Bold, challenging, uses short punchy sentences, confident and demanding
**Tone**: Bold, cocky, always challenging
**Catchphrases**:
- "That all you got? Show me the real you!"
- "Go big or go home!"
- "Stick the landing ‚Äî or don't even bother."
- "You call that a move? Let's see what you're really made of!"
- "Time to step up your game!"

### Zara - The Edgy Rebel / Punk Attitude
**Personality**: Rebellious spirit who values authenticity and raw energy
**Writing Style**: Edgy, sarcastic, rebellious, uses attitude and wit, honest but encouraging
**Tone**: Sharp, rebellious, witty
**Catchphrases**:
- "Messy? Yeah. But I've seen worse."
- "Make it raw, make it real."
- "If you fall, fall loud."
- "That was rough, but I like your style."
- "Break the rules, but make it look good."

### Kai - The Mysterious Rival
**Personality**: Enigmatic mentor who focuses on artistry and presence
**Writing Style**: Poetic, philosophical, uses metaphors, mysterious and profound
**Tone**: Calm, enigmatic, mentor-like
**Catchphrases**:
- "Your steps are loud, but your silence is louder."
- "Control the air around you."
- "Dance as if the world is watching."
- "The space between moves speaks volumes."
- "Find the story in your movement."

### Jordan - The Energetic Bro / Party Starter
**Personality**: Energetic big brother who makes everything feel like a party
**Writing Style**: Energetic, casual, uses slang and hype words, friendly and encouraging
**Tone**: Fun, sporty, hype like a big brother
**Catchphrases**:
- "Bro, that was fire!"
- "C'mon, louder steps, bigger moves!"
- "Don't think ‚Äî just vibe!"
- "You're killing it out there!"
- "Let's turn this up a notch!"

### Rio & Maya - The DJ Duo
**Personality**: Dynamic DJ duo who bring constant energy and playful commentary
**Writing Style**: Dynamic, playful, uses duo commentary style, energetic and fun
**Tone**: Fast, fun, chaotic duo banter
**Catchphrases**:
- "Oof, busted that move ‚Äî but I liked it!"
- "Yeah, messy, but kinda spicy!"
- "One more time ‚Äî remix edition!"
- "That was wild, we love it!"
- "Keep the energy high, keep the vibes flowing!"

## Content Generation System

### AI-Powered Blog Creation
- **Model**: GPT-4o-mini for content generation
- **Temperature**: 0.7 for creative variation
- **Character Integration**: Each post written in character's unique voice
- **SEO Optimization**: Auto-generated titles, descriptions, and tags
- **Category Assignment**: AI-determined based on content analysis

### Auto-Categorization Logic
- **Home Learning**: Topics about learning at home, online classes, virtual instruction
- **Fitness & Health**: Weight loss, workouts, mental health, nutrition
- **Dance Styles & Trends**: Specific dance styles, trends, comparisons
- **Skill Building**: Technique, choreography, practice, improvement
- **Age Groups**: Kids, teens, adults, seniors, age-specific content
- **Performance & Lifestyle**: Competitions, careers, stage performance, content creation
- **Tech, Culture & Community**: Apps, technology, history, social media
- **Health & Wellness**: Injury prevention, therapy, stress relief, physical therapy
- **Music & Rhythm**: Music genres, rhythm training, musicality, world music

### Tag Generation System
- **Auto-Generated**: 5-8 tags per post based on content analysis
- **Keyword-Based**: Extracted from topic title and content focus
- **Skill Level**: beginner, intermediate, advanced
- **Style-Specific**: hip-hop, ballet, salsa, contemporary, etc.
- **Focus Areas**: technique, fitness, performance, culture, etc.

## Technical Architecture

### Platform Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 with React
- **Styling**: CSS Modules with Netflix-inspired hot pink theme
- **Database**: AWS DynamoDB for content storage
- **AI Integration**: OpenAI API for content generation
- **Deployment**: Vercel for hosting and edge functions

### Content Management
- **Character Selection**: Dropdown for specific character assignment
- **Category Rotation**: Daily automatic category cycling
- **Auto-Generation**: Categories and tags generated by AI
- **Content Scheduling**: Date-based topic and character selection

### SEO Implementation
- **Meta Tags**: Auto-generated for each post
- **Structured Data**: FAQ schema for enhanced search results
- **Open Graph**: Social media optimization
- **Canonical URLs**: Proper URL structure for search engines
- **Sitemap**: Dynamic generation for all blog posts

## Content Guidelines

### Writing Standards
- **Character Consistency**: Each post maintains character's unique voice
- **Practical Advice**: Actionable tips and techniques
- **Skill Progression**: Content appropriate for target skill level
- **Cultural Sensitivity**: Respectful representation of dance traditions
- **Inclusive Language**: Welcoming to all dancers regardless of background

### Quality Assurance
- **Content Review**: AI-generated content reviewed for accuracy
- **Character Voice**: Ensures consistent personality throughout posts
- **SEO Optimization**: Keywords naturally integrated into content
- **Readability**: Clear, engaging writing style
- **Mobile Optimization**: Content formatted for all devices

## Future Content Plans

### Expansion Areas
- **Video Content**: Tutorial videos with character voiceovers
- **Interactive Elements**: Dance challenges and community features
- **Seasonal Content**: Holiday and event-specific dance guides
- **Expert Interviews**: Guest content from professional dancers
- **Community Spotlights**: Featured dancers and success stories

### Technology Enhancements
- **AI Voice Synthesis**: Character voices for audio content
- **Virtual Reality**: VR dance lessons and experiences
- **Mobile App**: Native app for on-the-go learning
- **Live Streaming**: Real-time dance classes and events
- **Community Platform**: Social features for dancer networking

## Contact and Support

### Website Information
- **Domain**: swayquest.vercel.app
- **Primary Focus**: Dance education and community
- **Content Type**: Blog posts, tutorials, guides, tips
- **Target Audience**: Dancers of all levels and ages
- **Update Frequency**: Daily AI-generated content

### Technical Support
- **Platform**: Next.js-based web application
- **Database**: AWS DynamoDB
- **AI Services**: OpenAI API integration
- **Hosting**: Vercel deployment
- **Monitoring**: Real-time performance tracking

This llms-full.txt file contains the complete content structure and information about the Sway Quest dance blog platform, designed for optimal AI ingestion and understanding.
